/Dummy.txt.baseContent:
Update initial route to stock and reformat plugin registration files

The initial route in `app_router.dart` has been changed from `dashboard` to `stock`.

Additionally, the following files related to plugin registration for Linux and Windows have been reformatted for improved readability:
- `windows/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.cc`
- `windows/flutter/generated_plugins.cmake`
- `linux/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.cc`
- `windows/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.h`
- `linux/flutter/generated_plugins.cmake`
- `linux/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.h`

The `devtools_options.yaml` file has been updated to include `provider: true` under extensions.
